mention.text: Washington Radio reports said Lebanon 's three television stations would screen a birthday message from Terry Anderson 4-year-old daughter
Sulome The daily newspapers An-Nahar and As-Safir and the French-language L'Orient-Le Jour published English texts of letters to Anderson
The Journalists ' Committee to Free Terry Anderson
colleagues from all over the United States , wrote : ''
